name: Stepan Company
description: Stepan Company is a global manufacturer of specialty and intermediate chemicals, founded in 1932 by Julius Stepan. Headquartered in Northfield, Illinois, the company operates through three main segments: Surfactants, Polymers, and Specialty Products. Stepan is a leader in the surfactants market, producing a wide range of products used in household and industrial cleaning products, personal care items, and agricultural applications. The company’s polymers segment focuses on producing polyurethane products for various applications, including flexible and rigid foams, and the specialty products segment offers a variety of specialty chemicals for niche markets. Stepan Company is committed to sustainability and innovation, striving to develop eco-friendly solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers while minimizing environmental impact. With a strong global presence, the company serves markets in North America, Latin America, Europe, and Asia, and continues to invest in research and development to enhance its product offerings and expand its market reach.
